e-fam Press logo to continue Shops %1$s Branches Settings Settings
Shop Shops All products are subject to a one shilling surcharge ActivityTest Hello world! Search Counter pick up means that once you have completed your shopping you can have your shopping packed and waiting for you at a designated counter at the supermarket. You just come and collect it.
//Onboarding NEXT Play Again To see the welcome slider again, go to help introduction SKIP "Your loved ones are the most important part of your life. That's why e-fam is making your shopping experience easier, leaving you with plenty of quality time for your family" A different way of shopping! Get every grocery item you could possibly want without leaving the comfort of your home. Your convenience is our priority at e-fam Shopping made faster Having a hectic work-day? Not to worry! e-fam delivers your shopping right to your office, hassle-free! Home/Office delivery Beat the crazy lines at the supermarket. You can shop with e-fam right on your phone and they will be packed and ready for collection by the time you get to store! Counter pickup GOT IT Home Screen
//What is What is Home Delivery What is Counter Pick up
Home delivery means you can have your shopping delivered to the address you have selected. Login To ensure we make your shopping experience AWESOME, we require your number. Please enter it below and press get code you will receive an SMS code, please enter it below and click proceed. Phone Number Get code via SMS enter the code you have received here
//Buttons Counter Pick Up Home Delivery | Foot Delivery PROCEED
How would you rate the delivery service? How easy is it to use e-fam app? Would you recommend e-fam to your friends?
